description: Contains additional benefit related information for each procedure in a price estimate.

columns.name: ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient estimate record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ADDL_LINE_NUM
columns.description: The line numberï¿½of the additional information charge line group.

columns.name: FILE_ORD_NUM
columns.description: The coverage level associated with the corresponding coverage (I PES 168).

columns.name: SERVICE_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The service type associated with the benefits on an estimate line.

columns.name: SERVICE_TYPE_ID_SERVICE_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of this benefit service type.

columns.name: PAYER_BEN_CAT
columns.description: The benefit category identifier supplied by the payer. This is used instead of a service type in estimates adjudicated by the payer. It should only be set on an estimate reference benefits.

columns.name: DEDUCTIBLE_AMT
columns.description: This is the deductible amount of an estimate line.

columns.name: COPAY_AMT
columns.description: This is the copay amount of an estimate line.

columns.name: COINS_AMT
columns.description: This is the coinsurance amount of an estimate line.

columns.name: SELFPAY_EXCESS_AMT
columns.description: This is the additional self-pay amount as a result of insurance limits.

columns.name: MOOP_AMT
columns.description: This is the maximum out-of-pocket amount for an estimate line.

columns.name: ANNUAL_LIMIT
columns.description: This is the annual insurance limit amount of an estimate line.

columns.name: LIFETIME_LIMIT
columns.description: This is the lifetime insurance limit amount of an estimate line.

columns.name: ROLLOVER_AMT
columns.description: This is the rollover period amount of an estimate line.

columns.name: NET_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description:
This is the network level used to calculate benefits of an estimate line.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


In


Out


Out of Area


N/A

columns.name: VISIT_MOOP_AMT
columns.description: This is the visit maximum out-of-pocket amount for an estimate line.

columns.name: VISIT_LIMIT
columns.description: This is the amount of an estimate line applied to a visit insurance limit.
